Package cz.cuni.mff.json4j

Class JSONObject

java.lang.Object
cz.cuni.mff.json4j.JSONObject
public class JSONObject extends Object
A wrapper for a JSON Object type. Utilizes a HashMap for holding the keys and values and provides wrapper methods to operate on it. Note that all added keys must pe plain Strings and all values must be wrapped in the JSONValue wrapper.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private HashMap<String,JSONValue>
    values
    The underlying hashMap holding the values of the Object.

  • Method Details

    • put

      public void put(String key, JSONValue value)
      Associate a value to the key
      Parameters:
      key - String to be used as a key. Note that this MUST NOT be wrapped in the JSOValue wrapper.
      value - The value to be associated to the key. This, on the other hand, MUST be wrapped in the JSONValue wrapper

    • remove

      public JSONValue remove(String key)
      Removes the value associated with the key.
      Parameters:
      key - of the value to be removed.
      Returns:
      The removed value.

    • get

      public JSONValue get(String key)
      Get the value associated to the provided key.
      Parameters:
      key - Key used to find the value. Note that this MUST NOT be wrapped in the JSOValue wrapper.
      Returns:
      JSON Value associated to the key.

    • serialize_readable

      public String serialize_readable()
      Serializes the Object in a human-readable manner. All key-value pairs are printed on separate lines, indented. All inner multiline values (Arrays and Objects) are indented as well. Empty Object is printed only as a pair of brackets.
      Returns:
      Human readable serialization of the Object.

    • serialize_compact

      public String serialize_compact()
      Serializes the Object in a space-saving manner. Uses minimal possible number of characters required.
      Returns:
      The compact serialization of the Object

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Uses the serialize_compact() method to output itself.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      Compactly serialized JSONObject
